definition: the four social bonds: propriety, justice, integrity and honor/see 禮義廉恥|礼义廉耻[li3 yi4 lian2 chi3]/the four directions/the four limbs (Chinese medicine)/four-dimensional
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Time is sometimes called the fourth dimension.
sentences.chinese: 时间有时被称为第四维。

sentences.english: This tutorial will help you create your own oceanic water in Cinema 4D.
sentences.chinese: 本教程将帮助你创造你自己的四维影院海洋水。

sentences.english: We know the forth dimension is dominated by the time.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道时间主宰着这第四维。

sentences.english: In the paper a new method for solving the position-al and metrical problems in four-dimensi…
sentences.chinese: 为解决四维空间的定位及度量问题提供了一种新方法。

sentences.english: Pseudo-Riemannian Lie algebras in dimension 4 are classified.
sentences.chinese: 给出了四维伪黎曼李代数的分类。

sentences.english: According to general relativity, time is stitched together with space to form four-dimensional space - time.
sentences.chinese: 根据广义相对论，时间与空间一起形成了四维时空。

sentences.english: An intensive discussion is presented of the four-dimensional description for one-dimensionally modulated structures.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一维调制结构的四维空间描述方法。

sentences.english: Shanghai Golden Swell Sanitaryware Co. , Ltd.
These multiple 4D black holes then combine into one larger black hole.
sentences.chinese: 这些四维黑洞会并成一个更大的黑洞。

sentences.english: This is a pure four-dimensional time.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种本真的四维时间。

sentences.english: Its four-dimensional beauty can stand up0 time.
sentences.chinese: 建筑的美是四维的，他能经得起时间的磨移。

sentences.english: This problem is specific to four-dimensional spacetime.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题是针对四维时空来说的。

sentences.english: Space is considered to be three-dimensional and time is thought of as the fourth dimension.
sentences.chinese: 空间被认为是三维的，而时间则被看作第四维。

sentences.english: The 4-D earth deformation monitoring network was sep up in North China by using GPS technology.
sentences.chinese: 应用GPS技术在华北布设了一个四维地形变监测网。

sentences.english: The method is used in 4-D time-lapse seismic.
sentences.chinese: 针对四维时间推移问题进行了数值模拟。

sentences.english: Science writer Gleick takes a panoramic approach to the fourth dimension, a subject that fascinated the fin de siècle scientific world.
sentences.chinese: 科学作家格莱克对第四维空间进行了全景式的描绘。

definition: four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)
time and place/world of a particular locale and era/(physics) space-time

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
